decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to consistently assemble the combo of Greasefang and Parhelion II as quickly as possible, supported by cards like Cryptcaller Chariot, Monument to Endurance, and Guardian of New Benalia. The deck also includes cards like Fleeting Spirit and Seasoned Hallowblade for protection and evasion, as well as removal spells like Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with its combo pieces and synergies.

The deck focuses on quickly playing powerful artifact creatures and using various spells to buff them up and deal damage to the opponent. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and direct damage spells, while also utilizing artifacts for additional synergy and control options. The deck aims to maintain a fast-paced tempo and put pressure on the opponent early in the game, leveraging the versatility of artifacts and efficient spells to secure victory.
